name: nijan-portfolio

scripts.deploy: npm run build:domain && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages -r https://github.com/nijanthan-elangovan/portfolio-website.git -m "deploy (custom domain)" -c njthnelvgn.com
scripts.deploy:repo: npm run build:repo && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages -r https://github.com/nijanthan-elangovan/portfolio-website.git -m "deploy (repo path)"

description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.
